title: Misunderstanding After Returning From Another World?! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   School Life
tags: Bullying   Childhood Friends   Delinquents   Dense Protagonist   Discrimination   Harsh Training   Hiding True Identity   Loli   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Past Plays a Big Role   Popular Love Interests   Returning from Another World   Sadistic Characters   Secrets   Tsundere   Underestimated Protagonist
author: Akai   あかい
description:
After two years of painful living in a different world, I and three girls from my class have finally returned to Japan.

However, due to various misunderstandings, I am rumored to be a delinquent harem bastard who skipped school for two years to hang out with the three girls.

Having lost our place in school, the four of us start a group meeting to somehow regain our youth and spend our days having fun.

Futhermore, as I occasionally get picked for a fight, the misunderstanding accelerates, and I become the king of the delinquents, feared by the other students.>
